name: Smashing Cafè
description:
Your name is Tamara the owner of a little coffee shop the "Smashing Cafè".

A lot of people wants your delicious coffee , cappuccinos, croissants, biscuits, etc.

In order to serve them you have to match at least 3 images of the order in vertical or horizontal. One item at the time.

You have also to clean the tables when people leave .

if the queue is too long and the tables all the tables are busy or dirty the game finishes.

Use the mouse to play.

Developer and Graphics : Mauro Rilla - https://misterm.itch.io/

Music : Ramsey Johnson  ramseyj1990@gmail.com

Game made for the weekly game Jam https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-159 , theme : café
